ComicInfo.Title: Skanks, Shanks and Shackles Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
After her ordeal with fighting Demons, both physical and emotional, Janey makes an effort to regroup and keep a promise she made to herself - busting her father out of prison!! Can Janey slip by the guards and make a quick escape? Well, if you've been reading Zombie Tramp for the last two years, you know that probably won’t happen!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Dan Mendoza | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | C | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Bill McKay | 3 | D | Limited Edition Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Bill McKay | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Jarro | 5 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Jarro | 6 | Note: The digital edition (8/24/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
